elements.name: Auftrag
elements.title: Decide whether the examples are dunning, expiry date or fixed-date transactions and give reasons for your answer.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: In January, the Zofingen Business School orders 1000 promotional ballpoint pens to give away to its customers to mark the company's anniversary in May.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: This is a reminder transaction, as no delivery deadline was apparently agreed and there is still sufficient time before the pens are issued (Art. 102 para. 1 CO).

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Mrs. Schnyder orders ten primroses as grave decorations for the end of February.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: As no specific expiry date has been agreed, this is a dunning transaction.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Decide whether the examples are dunning, expiry date or fixed-date transactions and give reasons for your answer.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Ms. Linsing orders 300 g of petit fours for the board meeting next Friday at 10 a.m.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: The petit fours must be delivered by the Board meeting, after which Ms. Linsing no longer has to accept them (Art. 108 para. 3 CO).

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Mr. Graven orders a transverse flute for his daughter with a delivery date of 25.4.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: In this case, a specific expiry date of April 25 was agreed (Art. 102 para. 2 CO).

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Decide whether the examples are dunning, expiry date or fixed-date transactions and give reasons for your answer.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Mr. Freytag orders drinks from a caterer for his company anniversary on 22.10.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: This is a fixed-date transaction; the drinks are to be delivered by the celebration at the latest (Art. 108 para. 3 CO).

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Mr. Klein orders a new BMW X3 at the end of the year.

elements.name: question12
elements.title: Justification:
elements.correctAnswer: As no specific expiry date was agreed, this is a reminder transaction (Art. 102 para. 1 CO).
